prompt_template:
For the [tool_name] AI based-tool, do a thorough internet search, analyze all the resources and give me in details description including the following:

	1. The owner/creator of the tool
	2. What the tool exactly does
	3. How does it use AI
	4. What benefits it brings by incorporating AI
	5. What major tasks can it optimize with the help of AI
	6. The pricing of the tools
	7. The official website of the tool
	
References used in the analysis (Give all the resources referred to):
(1)
(2)
Etc.
